attributes.action: discontinue support and funding to the TFG and the Ethiopian force in Somalia, and to reques immediate withdrawal's of Ethiopian troops from Somalia, and not to recognize all changes made to the Somali Parliament since the martial
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To reject the changes made by the leaders of the TFG during the martial law period, and invite the Parliament Speaker Shariff Hassan to the reconciliation process as the speaker of Parliament  
To urge the leaders of the TFG to lift the martial law.
 To establish a transparency entity to curb corruption in Somalia 
To encourage to support the democratic process of the 
We also appeal to all international communities to discontinue support and funding to the TFG and the Ethiopian force in Mogadishu who have used resources to discourage development and democracy in Mogadishu, we consider those who support such a criminals: to be direct contributors to crimes against humanity and in direct violation against human rights.
